articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Interstellar object ʻOumuamua may be a fragment of Pluto-like planet - CNN
articles.description: The first observed interstellar object zipped through our solar system in October 2017. Now, the latest research suggests it is a fragment of a Pluto-like planet from another solar system, made of nitrogen ice.
